branchCategory.name: Legacy
branchCategory.description: <p>These products have been replaced with newer equivalents and in some cases may be discontinued in the near future.</p>

branchItem.name: AS***1F, Speed Controller, One-touch Fitting, Elbow & Universal Types
branchItem.description: <p>These products have been replaced with newer equivalents and in some cases may be discontinued in the near future.</p>
branchItem.bullets: <UL> <LI>Speed controller with one-touch fittings <LI>Body sizes: M3, M5, 1/8, 1/4, 3/8, 1/2 <LI>Maximum operating pressure 1MPa <LI>Meter in or meter out control <LI>Port sizes: M3, M5, U10/32, 01, 02, 03, 04 <LI>Various tube O.D. in both metric and inch </LI></UL>
